scn GraveContScript
short Opened
begin OnActivate
if IsActionRef player if Opened Activate elseif ( player.GetItemCount WeapShovel >= 1 ) Activate set Opened to 1 RewardKarma -15 else showMessage NoShovelMsg endif endif
end

scn VMS15LoyalDetonatorFireScript
int bDoOnce
begin OnFire if GetObjectiveDisplayed VMS15 45 && VMS15.bAtLocation && bDoOnce == 0 VMS15BallastDeployerREF.Activate Player 1 set bDoOnce to 1 else ;//== Otherwise we behave like a normal Detonator player.DetonatePlacedExplosives
; Added by Akil Hooper 3/3/10 if vHDBattleController.bGeneratorsActive == 1 ;showwarning "Blow Up the Generators" if player.GetInWorldspace WastelandNV == 1 vHDGenerator01.do 50000 vHDGenerator02.do 50000 vHDGenerator03.do 50000 vHDGenerator04.do 50000 set vHDBattleController.bGeneratorsActive to -1 endif endif
; Added by Charles Staples 03/08/10 if VMQ03b.bWatsonHelmetRigged == 1 if VMQ03b.iWatsonHasHat == 1 VHDPrivateWatsonREF.PlaceAtMe C4ExplosionNoLOS 1 else VHDWatsonsHelmetREF.PlaceAtMe C4ExplosionNoLOS 1 endif rewardkarma -100 set VMQ03b.bWatsonHelmetRigged to -1 Set RadioNewVegas.bKimballMOD to 4 endif endif end

scn EDEScriptDisabled
int Waiting ; 0 = Not waiting, 1 = Waiting int CombatStyleMelee ; 0 = Not melee, 1= Melee int CombatStyleRanged ; 0 = Not ranged, 1 = Ranged int IsFollowingDefault ; 0 = Not following default, 1 = Is following default range int IsFollowingLong ; 0 = Not following long, 1 = Is following long int FollowerSwitchAggressive ; 0 = Passive (wait on player), 1 = Aggressive (attack when see enemies) int iEDEFixed ; 1 = EDE Fixed, 2 = EDE Upgraded int iButton ; Tracks the button presses for EDE's repair menus int iMenu ; Tracks the current menu screen for EDE's repair menus int iRepairState float fTimer
begin OnActivate Player if IsActionRef Player set vDialogueEDE.bEDEExamined to 1 if Player.IsInCombat == 1 showmessage EDECombatMessage else showMessage EDERepair00 endif endif end
begin OnActivate if IsActionRef Player if Player.IsInCombat == 1 showmessage EDECombatMessage else showMessage EDERepair00 endif endif end
begin GameMode if iEDEFixed == 1 set fTimer to GetSecondsPassed + fTimer if fTimer >= 2 set iEDEFixed to 2 EDE1Ref.SetRestrained 1 EDE1REF.enable EDE1Ref.ResetAI disable endif elseif iEDEFixed == 2 disable return endif set iButton to GetButtonPressed if iButton == 0 set iMenu to 0 endif if iMenu == 0 ; EDERepair00 if iButton == 1 showMessage EDERepair01 set iMenu to 1 elseif iButton == 2 ShowMessage EDERepair03 set iMenu to 3 elseif iButton == 3 ShowMessage EDERepair02 set iMenu to 2 endif elseif iMenu == 1 ; EDERepair01 if iButton == 1 imod FadeToBlackAndBackQuickExtendedISFX set iEDEFixed to 1 disableplayercontrols startquest vDialogueEDE set vNPCFollowers.bEDEAvailable to 1 set VNPCFollowers.nRecruited to VNPCFollowers.nRecruited + 1; EDE1Ref.MoveTo EDEHomeMarker elseif iButton == 2 showmessage EDERepair02 set iMenu to 2 elseif iButton == 3 showMessage EDERepair04 set iMenu to 4 endif elseif iMenu == 3 ; EDERepair03 if iButton == 1 imod FadeToBlackAndBackQuickExtendedISFX set iEDEFixed to 1 disableplayercontrols startquest vDialogueEDE set vNPCFollowers.bEDEAvailable to 1 set VNPCFollowers.nRecruited to VNPCFollowers.nRecruited + 1; EDE1Ref.MoveTo EDEHomeMarker elseif iButton == 2 showMessage EDERepair04 set iMenu to 4 endif elseif iMenu == 2 ; EDERepair02 if iButton == 1 showMessage EDERepair01 set iMenu to 1 elseif iButton == 2 set iRepairState to 1 showMessage EDERepair03 set iMenu to 3 endif elseif iMenu == 4 ; EDERepair04 if iButton == 1 player.RemoveItem ScrapElectronics 1 player.RemoveItem SpareParts 3 player.RemoveItem SensorModule 2 imod FadeToBlackAndBackQuickExtendedISFX set iEDEFixed to 1 disableplayercontrols startquest vDialogueEDE set vNPCFollowers.bEDEAvailable to 1 set VNPCFollowers.nRecruited to VNPCFollowers.nRecruited + 1; EDE1Ref.MoveTo EDEHomeMarker elseif iButton == 2 && iRepairState == 0 showMessage EDERepair01 set iMenu to 1 elseif iButton == 2 && iRepairState == 1 showMessage EDERepair03 set iMenu to 3 elseif iButton == 3 showMessage EDERepair02 set iMenu to 2 endif endif end

ScriptName PreordVault13CanteenScript
Int bMessage
Begin GameMode
If Player.GetItemCount PreordVaultCanteen If bMessage == 0 && GetPlayerControlsDisabled == 0 && player.GetInCell Endgame == 0 Set bMessage to 1 ShowTutorialMenu PreordVault13Canteen EndIf Player.CIOS PreordVault13CanteenHeal EndIf
End

scn 000cashscript
short doonce short ncrvar short legionvar short capsvar short cashvar short tradein short temp1 short type ;1=caps 2=legion 3=ncr 4=pre-war 5=all 6=all non-caps ref cashier
;Bottlecaps are 1:1 ;Legion Denarii are 1:4 ;Legion Aureus are 1:100 ;NCR dollars are 2.5:1 (5:2, 20:8, 100:40) ;PreWar Money is 1:10
BEGIN MENUMODE if doonce set temp1 to 0 set tradein to 0
;Caps if (player.GetItemCount caps001 && capsvar) set temp1 to player.GetItemCount caps001 player.RemoveItem caps001 temp1 set tradein to tradein + temp1 endif
;Legion Denarii if (player.GetItemCount MoneyLegion1 && legionvar) set temp1 to player.GetItemCount MoneyLegion1 player.RemoveItem MoneyLegion1 temp1 set tradein to tradein + (temp1 * 4) endif
;Legion Aureus if (player.GetItemCount MoneyLegion25 && legionvar) set temp1 to player.GetItemCount MoneyLegion25 player.RemoveItem MoneyLegion25 temp1 set tradein to tradein + (temp1 * 100) endif
;$5 NCR if (player.GetItemCount MoneyNCR5 && ncrvar) set temp1 to player.GetItemCount MoneyNCR5 player.RemoveItem MoneyNCR5 temp1 set tradein to tradein + (temp1 * 2) endif
;$20 NCR if (player.GetItemCount MoneyNCR20 && ncrvar) set temp1 to player.GetItemCount MoneyNCR20 player.RemoveItem MoneyNCR20 temp1 set tradein to tradein + (temp1 * 8) endif
;$100NCR if (player.GetItemCount MoneyNCR100 && ncrvar) set temp1 to player.GetItemCount MoneyNCR100 player.RemoveItem MoneyNCR100 temp1 set tradein to tradein + (temp1 * 40) endif
;Pre-war Money if (player.GetItemCount PrewarMoney && cashvar) set temp1 to player.GetItemCount PrewarMoney player.RemoveItem PrewarMoney temp1 set tradein to tradein + (temp1 * 10) endif
if (cashier.GetInFaction VTopsChairmenFaction) player.AddItem TheTopsChip tradein elseif (cashier.GetInFaction VWhiteGloveSocietyFaction) player.AddItem UltraLuxeChip tradein elseif (cashier.GetInFaction VFSGarretFaction) player.AddItem AtomicWranglerChip tradein elseif (cashier.GetInFaction OmertaFaction) player.AddItem GomorrahChip tradein elseif (cashier.GetInFaction PrimmResidentsFaction) player.AddItem VikkiVanceChip tradein endif
set temp1 to 0 set tradein to 0 set capsvar to 0 set legionvar to 0 set ncrvar to 0 set cashvar to 0 set cashier to 0 endif
set doonce to 0 stopquest cashierquest1
END

scn CashierPayoutScript
short doonce ref cashier short Chipsvar short typevar ;1=caps, 2=legion, 3=ncr, 4=prewar short Legion100 short Legion4 short NCR100 short NCR20 short NCR5 short Prewar
BEGIN MENUMODE
if doonce == 1
if (cashier.GetInFaction VTopsChairmenFaction) set Chipsvar to player.GetItemCount TheTopsChip player.RemoveItem TheTopsChip Chipsvar elseif (cashier.GetInFaction VWhiteGloveSocietyFaction) set Chipsvar to player.GetItemCount UltraLuxeChip player.RemoveItem UltraLuxeChip Chipsvar elseif (cashier.GetInFaction VFSGarretFaction) set chipsvar to player.GetItemCount AtomicWranglerChip player.RemoveItem AtomicWranglerChip chipsvar elseif (cashier.GetInFaction OmertaFaction) set chipsvar to player.GetItemCount GomorrahChip player.RemoveItem GomorrahChip chipsvar elseif (cashier.GetInFaction PrimmResidentsFaction) set chipsvar to player.GetItemCount VikkiVanceChip player.RemoveItem VikkiVanceChip chipsvar endif
if typevar == 2 ;set Legion100 to (Chipsvar/100) ;player.AddItem MoneyLegion25 Legion100 ;set Chipsvar to (Chipsvar - (100*Legion100))
set Legion4 to (Chipsvar/4) player.AddItem MoneyLegion1 Legion4 set Chipsvar to (Chipsvar - (4*Legion4))
elseif typevar == 3 set NCR100 to (Chipsvar/40) player.AddItem MoneyNCR100 NCR100 set Chipsvar to (Chipsvar - (40*NCR100))
set NCR20 to (Chipsvar/8) player.AddItem MoneyNCR20 NCR20 set Chipsvar to (Chipsvar - (8*NCR20))
set NCR20 to (Chipsvar/2) player.AddItem MoneyNCR5 NCR5 set Chipsvar to (Chipsvar - (2*NCR5)) elseif typevar == 4 set Prewar to (Chipsvar/10) player.AddItem PrewarMoney Prewar set Chipsvar to (Chipsvar - (10*Prewar)) endif
player.AddItem caps001 chipsvar
set cashier to 0 set Chipsvar to 0 set typevar to 0 set Legion100 to 0 set Legion4 to 0 set NCR100 to 0 set NCR20 to 0 set NCR5 to 0 set Prewar to 0 set doonce to 0
endif
stopquest CashierPayoutQuest END

scn TutorialKillerQuestMainScript
BEGIN MENUMODE 4
let array_var arrFiles := GetFiles "Config\Tutorial Killer" let int iSizeFiles := ar_Size arrFiles let int iIndexFiles := -1 while iSizeFiles > (iIndexFiles += 1) let string_var svFilePath := sv_Construct "Tutorial Killer\" + $arrFiles[iIndexFiles] let array_var arrList := GetINISection "All" $svFilePath 1 sv_Destruct svFilePath ForEach array_var arrEntry <- arrList let string_var svEditorID := $arrEntry["Key"] let ref rTemp := EditorIDToFormID $svEditorID sv_Destruct svEditorID if IsFormValid rTemp if GetType rTemp == 98 let int iState := arrEntry["Value"] if iState == 0 elseif iState == -1 SetMessageDisabled rTemp 1 else SetMessageFlags rTemp 0 if iState > 2 SetMessageDisplayTime rTemp iState endif endif endif endif loop let arrEntry := ar_Null let arrList := ar_Null loop let arrFiles := ar_Null
if IsModLoaded "JIP Companions Command & Control.esp" let rTemp := GFFM "JIP Companions Command & Control.esp" "add" let int iCCC := GetVariable "bWelcome" rTemp let iCCC := iCCC | 1 SetVariable "bWelcome" iCCC rTemp endif
StopQuest TutorialKillerQuestMain END

scn NiptonFiresQuestScript
short doonce float days
begin gamemode
if NiptonMapMarker.GetMapMarkerVisible != 2 ;player hasn't been to Nipton return else if doonce == 0 set days to GameDaysPassed set doonce to 1 elseif doonce == 1 if (GameDaysPassed - days) >= 1 && player.GetInCell Nipto == 0 && player.GetDistance NiptonMapMarker > 4000 NiptonFiresMasterREF.disable set doonce to 2 StopQuest NiptonFiresQuest endif endif endif
end

scn VFSSilverRushSecondGuardTriggerScript
int DoOnce
begin OnTriggerEnter player
if GetStage VMS29a >= 30 && GetStage VMS29a < 200 && GetDeadCount VFSGloriaVanGraff == 0 if DoOnce == 0 VFSVanGraffDoorGuardREF.Enable VFSVanGraffDoorGuardREF.evp set DoOnce to 1 endif endif
end

scn CombatMusicQuestScript
int bOn float fTimer ref tgt
int iKey int iSize float fPlayerAndActorDist ref rActor array_var aActors
ref rCrosshairRef
; BUGS TO FIX: ;-to-update
begin GameMode if GetGameLoaded || GetGameRestarted let bOn := 0 SetNumericGameSetting fCombatMusicGroupThreatRatioMax 0 SetNumericGameSetting fCombatMusicNearCombatInnerRadius 0 SetNumericGameSetting fCombatMusicNearCombatOuterRadius 0 SetNumericGameSetting fCombatMusicPlayerTargetedThreatRatio 0 SetOnHitEventHandler CombatMusicOnHitUDF 1 endif
if bOn ;after player hits or player gets hit in combat If Player.IsInCombat == 0 ;reset music changes for when combat ends if fTimer >= 5 SetNumericGameSetting fCombatMusicGroupThreatRatioMax 0 SetNumericGameSetting fCombatMusicNearCombatInnerRadius 0 SetNumericGameSetting fCombatMusicNearCombatOuterRadius 0 SetNumericGameSetting fCombatMusicPlayerTargetedThreatRatio 0 let fTimer := 0 let bOn := 0 else let fTimer += GetSecondsPassed endif endif endif
; get a list of all actors in the cell let aActors := GetActorsByProcessingLevel 0 let iKey := ar_size aActors
; limit process if no actors if iKey <= 0 Return endif
if bOn == 0 let iSize := ar_size aActors set iKey to -1 while iSize > (iKey += 1)
if Player.IsInCombat ;check if actors are attacking player to then enable combat music let rActor := aActors[iKey] if rActor.IsAttacking if rActor.GetCombatTarget == Player SetNumericGameSetting fCombatMusicGroupThreatRatioMax 4 SetNumericGameSetting fCombatMusicNearCombatInnerRadius 500 SetNumericGameSetting fCombatMusicNearCombatOuterRadius 2000 SetNumericGameSetting fCombatMusicPlayerTargetedThreatRatio 100 let bOn := 1 break endif endif endif loop endif
; enable combat music if player sees enemy during combat if bOn == 0 if Player.isincombat let rCrosshairRef := GetCrosshairRefEx if ( rCrosshairRef && IsFormValid target && ( GetType rCrosshairRef == 42 || GetType rCrosshairRef == 43 ) ) if rCrosshairRef.GetActorValue aggression != 0 SetNumericGameSetting fCombatMusicGroupThreatRatioMax 4 SetNumericGameSetting fCombatMusicNearCombatInnerRadius 500 SetNumericGameSetting fCombatMusicNearCombatOuterRadius 2000 SetNumericGameSetting fCombatMusicPlayerTargetedThreatRatio 100 let bOn := 1 endif endif endif endif
end

scn CombatMusicOnHitUDF
ref rTarget ref rAttacker int iHitLocation
begin Function { }
if CombatMusicQuest.bOn == 0 If Player.IsInCombat set rTarget to this set rAttacker to rTarget.GetHitAttacker
if rAttacker == Player SetNumericGameSetting fCombatMusicGroupThreatRatioMax 4 SetNumericGameSetting fCombatMusicNearCombatInnerRadius 500 SetNumericGameSetting fCombatMusicNearCombatOuterRadius 2000 SetNumericGameSetting fCombatMusicPlayerTargetedThreatRatio 100 let CombatMusicQuest.bOn := 1 endif endif endif
end

Scn BA2ArchimedesIIBeamScript
Int DoOnce
Float Timer
Begin Gamemode
If HasLoaded3D == 1 If IsAnimPlaying Right == 0 Playgroup Right 1 else If Timer < 13.333 Set Timer to (Timer + GetSecondsPassed) If DoOnce == 0 If Timer >= 1.325 PlaceAtMe BA2ArchimedesIIExplosion Set DoOnce to 1 endif endif else Disable MarkForDelete endif endif endif
End

ScriptName BA2ArchimedesIIBeamEffectScript
Float Timer Short DoOnce Short IsPile
Begin ScriptEffectStart
If GetIsGhost ;Do nothing if the target is set to ghost. Return endif
If (GetItemCount BA2DeathToken == 0) && (GetDead == 0) If IsEssential == 0 ;Only add the token/reward XP if the target isn't essential. If GetIsReference Player == 0 ;Don't add the item to the player if they kill themselves with it. Additem BA2DeathToken 1 endif Kill Player else Kill Return ;Halt the rest of the FX setup immediatly if the target is essential. endif endif
SetCriticalStage DisintegrateStart PMS AlienCritGlowFXShader PMS effectAlienDisintegration PMS Flames01 PMS Smoke01 Set Timer to 1.8 Set DoOnce to 0 Set IsPile to 0
End
Begin ScriptEffectUpdate
If IsEssential || GetIsGhost ;Do nothing if the target is set to ghost, or is essential. Return endif
If DoOnce == 0 If IsPile == 0 If Timer <= 0.5 AttachAshPile Set IsPile to 1 EndIf EndIf
If Timer <= 0 SetCriticalStage DisintegrateEnd SMS AlienCritGlowFXShader SMS effectAlienDisintegration SMS Flames01 Set DoOnce to 1 EndIf Set Timer to (Timer - GetSecondsPassed) EndIf
End

Scn BA2ArchimedesIITracerScript
Float AngleOffset ;What to offset the position by, should be set to 360/Timer Max. Float CircleAngle ;The result of the AngleOffset + starting postion of the circle. Float Distance ;The initial distance from the targeter, should be set to Max Distance/Timer Max.
Float NewX Float NewY Float NewZ
Float Timer
Begin OnLoad
Set Timer to 5 Set NewZ to (GetPos Z + 100000) SetPos Z NewZ SetAngle X 90 SetAngle Y 90 SetAngle Z 0
If GetIsID BA2ArchimedesIITracer01 Set NewX to BA2ArchimedesIIQuest.TrackerX + (1024 * Sin 360) Set NewY to BA2ArchimedesIIQuest.TrackerY + (1024 * Cos 360) SetPos X NewX SetPos Y NewY elseif GetIsID BA2ArchimedesIITracer02 Set NewX to BA2ArchimedesIIQuest.TrackerX + (1024 * Sin 480) Set NewY to BA2ArchimedesIIQuest.TrackerY + (1024 * Cos 480) SetPos X NewX SetPos Y NewY elseif GetIsID BA2ArchimedesIITracer03 Set NewX to BA2ArchimedesIIQuest.TrackerX + (1024 * Sin 600) Set NewY to BA2ArchimedesIIQuest.TrackerY + (1024 * Cos 600) SetPos X NewX SetPos Y NewY endif
End
Begin Gamemode
If Timer > 0 Set Timer to (Timer - GetSecondsPassed)
FireWeapon BA2ArchimedesIITracerWeap
Set Distance to (204.8 * Timer) Set AngleOffset to (72 * Timer)
If GetIsID BA2ArchimedesIITracer01 Set CircleAngle to AngleOffset Set NewX to (BA2ArchimedesIIQuest.TrackerX) + (Distance * Sin CircleAngle) Set NewY to (BA2ArchimedesIIQuest.TrackerY) + (Distance * Cos CircleAngle) SetPos X NewX SetPos Y NewY elseif GetIsID BA2ArchimedesIITracer02 Set CircleAngle to (AngleOffset + 120) Set NewX to (BA2ArchimedesIIQuest.TrackerX) + (Distance * Sin CircleAngle) Set NewY to (BA2ArchimedesIIQuest.TrackerY) + (Distance * Cos CircleAngle) SetPos X NewX SetPos Y NewY elseif GetIsID BA2ArchimedesIITracer03 Set CircleAngle to (AngleOffset + 240) Set NewX to (BA2ArchimedesIIQuest.TrackerX) + (Distance * Sin CircleAngle) Set NewY to (BA2ArchimedesIIQuest.TrackerY) + (Distance * Cos CircleAngle) SetPos X NewX SetPos Y NewY endif else If GetIsID BA2ArchimedesIITracer01 != 1 Disable MarkForDelete else If Timer > -2 Set Timer to (Timer - GetSecondsPassed) FireWeapon BA2ArchimedesIITracerWeap else If BA2ArchimedesIIQuest.Tracking == 1 FireWeapon BA2ArchimedesIIPlacerWeap Set BA2ArchimedesIIQuest.Tracking to 0 else Disable MarkForDelete endif endif endif endif
End

ScriptName BA2EuclidsCFinderSCRIPT
; checks preconditions for firing. swaps the gun's screen texture in event of a failure to meet them. Spawns a stream of target pointers at the reticle, which the targeting visual effect will align to.
BEGIN OnFire if (VMS03.bRetargetComplete && VMS03.nPowerConfiguration == 4) SwapTexture player "##Screen:0" "weapons\1handpistol\EuclidScreenSuccess" if (Player.IsInInterior == 0 && Player.GetInWorldspace Lucky38World == 0) && (BA2ArchimedesIIQuest.Tracking == 0) PlaceAtReticle BA2ArchimedesIITracker 1 0 EuclidPointerRange PlaceAtReticle BA2ArchimedesIITracer01 PlaceAtReticle BA2ArchimedesIITracer02 PlaceAtReticle BA2ArchimedesIITracer03 Set BA2ArchimedesIIQuest.Tracking to 1 else SwapTexture player "##Screen:0" "weapons\1handpistol\EuclidScreenFailure" Player.Additem AmmoNVArchimedesII 1 1 endif else SwapTexture player "##Screen:0" "weapons\1handpistol\EuclidScreenFailure" Player.Additem AmmoNVArchimedesII 1 1 endif END
BEGIN GameMode if(BA2ArchimedesIIQuest.Tracking) PlaceAtReticle BA2ArchimedesIITracker 1 0 EuclidPointerRange; endif END

Int Tracking

Scn BA2ArchimedesIITrackerScript
Begin OnLoad
Set BA2ArchimedesIIQuest.TrackerX to GetPos X Set BA2ArchimedesIIQuest.TrackerY to GetPos Y
End
Begin Gamemode
Set BA2ArchimedesIIQuest.TrackerX to GetPos X Set BA2ArchimedesIIQuest.TrackerY to GetPos Y Disable MarkForDelete
End

scn VFSVanGraffDoorThugScript
ref ActivatingObject
;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
begin OnDeath
; Update var tracking how many Van Graffs have been killed set VMS29a.NumVanGraffsDead to VMS29a.NumVanGraffsDead + 1
end
;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
begin OnActivate
set ActivatingObject to GetActionREF
if ActivatingObject.GetIsReference player && GetDead == 0 && player.IsSneaking == 0 Activate endif
end

Scn MrShershNVDLC05FlamerShaderEffectSCRIPT
; J.S. 6/15/11 - Simple script, tied to a MGEF, to apply a fire shader upon being hit by the spell/enchantment.

END
BEGIN ScriptEffectFinish

END

I think we should travel together.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Comment (NAM2) : Do not record. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those thieves had some gall, stealing from a museum dedicated to romanticizing a couple of criminals!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些小偷真是厚颜无耻，他们居然敢从雌雄大盗的博物馆里偷东西！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll make sure the gun ends up back on display. I thank you, Primm thanks you, and I do believe Vance'd thank you, if he could.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会把枪重新放回陈列箱里的。谢谢，我代表普瑞姆感谢您，我相信万斯若是泉下有知，也一定会感谢您的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem WeapNV9mmSubmachineGunUnique 1 PrimmSlimREF.additem WeapNV9mmSubmachineGunUnique 1 set nVPrimmVanceGun.VanceGunCase to 3 RewardXP 100
I found the gun. Here it is.
On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想了一下，还是留在我身边吧。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0010C769] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : Do not record. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, stick with me.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0010C769] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : Do not record. EmotionType : Neutral

; JSH 11.05.10 - Teleport all the ED-Es to Nash's house in Primm. EDE1REF.MoveToMarkerWithFade EDEHomeMarker EDE2REF.MoveToMarkerWithFade EDEHomeMarker EDE3REF.MoveToMarkerWithFade EDEHomeMarker
showmessage FollowerMessageLeaveEDE showmessage FollowerMessagePerkEDERemove
Any idea what the NCR's up to in Primm?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道NCR在普瑞姆做什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Military operations are classified information. The brass is familiar with the situation at the NCRCF.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军事行动属于内部机密。我想上面的人应该会更清楚NCR监狱的情况。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does the NCR have any plans to attack the prison north of here?
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR有进攻北面监狱的计划吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I convinced Pauline that you shouldn't go through with this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经说服了宝琳，她也觉得应该收手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Oh, thank god! I love that woman, but I swear this time she was gonna get us killed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？哦，感谢上帝！我爱那女人，但她这一次真的差点害死我们！

ESP.ORIGINAL: The gun's in the safe. The combination's 05-23-34. Take it far away from here, before she changes her mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 枪在保险箱里。密码是05-23-34。在她改变主意之前，带着枪赶紧走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: if getitemcount WeapNV9mmSubmachineGunUnique == 1 removeitem WeapNV9mmSubmachineGunUnique 1 SammySafeREF.additemhealthpercent WeapNV9mmSubmachineGunUnique 1 0.8 endif

SammySafeREF.setownership SammySafeREF.unlock ;set nVPrimmVanceGun.VanceGunCase to 3 set nVPrimmVanceGun.SammyPauline to 2
if nVPrimmVanceGun.VanceGunCase == 0 set nVPrimmVanceGun.VanceGunCase to 1 addtopic PrimmSlimGun endif
Pauline says you should give me the gun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 宝琳说你应该把枪给我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Charm Pauline into Rethinking their plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吸引波淋以让他重新考虑他们的计划。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Really? You think so? We've only got the one gun, and there's two of us... and we've never done anything like this before...
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 真的吗？你也这么想？我们两个人，却只有一把枪……我们以前从没做过这种事……

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've never been on the Strip, either, so we don't know how many guards the casinos have. And I kept having these nightmares...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们也从未进过长街，所以根本不知道那里的赌场有多少守卫。而且最近我还一直做噩梦……

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are we thinking? We're gonna get ourselves killed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都在想什么呢？这根本就是送死嘛！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, tell Sammy to give you the gun, all right? Just take it! I don't want it around, tempting us to do something stupid!
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，你去让萨米把枪交给你吧，行吗？拿走吧！我不想再看见它了，老是诱惑我们干蠢事！

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the greatest plan I've ever heard in my entire life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我这辈子听过的最伟大的计划。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some Powder Gangers did you wrong, is that it? Get in line.
ESP.TRADUIT: 难不成炸药帮的人欺负到你头上了？那你可得排队了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, you do look capable enough, and manpower hasn't been easy to come by...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，你看着倒是有两把刷子，何况现在人手也不好找……

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Fine by me if you want to put yourself in harm's way. I'll mark the staging area on your map. Talk to Sergeant Lee.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行吧。如果你非要给自己找罪受，我也没意见。我会在地图上给你标明集合地。去跟李中士报到吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set VFreeformNCRCF.AlliedWithNCR to 1 PrimmSergeantLeeREF.enable SetAlly VMS02NCRFaction PlayerFaction 0 0 SetStage VMS02 40
Classified or not, I want to help make the attack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不管什么军事机密，我只想帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm unable to work out a deal. The Great Khans are all yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没法达成协议，大汗帮的人归你处置了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was worth a try. I'll have to proceed with the attack as ordered, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经尽力了。那么我只能依照命令开始强攻了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Oh, I wasn't expecting you to agree so easily. That's great!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？哦，没想到你这么容易就答应了。真是太好了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emily Ortal [0011904E] (file) Quest : ([0011A0C5]vfreeformlucky38) The Moon Comes Over the Tower EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, take this packet sniffer. It'll allow us to intercept data on Mr. House's network.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿着，带上这个数据探测器。它能让我们截取豪斯先生网络上的数据。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emily Ortal [0011904E] (file) Quest : ([0011A0C5]vfreeformlucky38) The Moon Comes Over the Tower EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might have to manually remove the encryption from his data network, but hopefully you won't have too much trouble. Good luck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也许得手动破解数据网络密钥，不过应该不会遇到太多麻烦。祝你好运！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emily Ortal [0011904E] (file) Quest : ([0011A0C5]vfreeformlucky38) The Moon Comes Over the Tower EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: StartQuest vfreeformlucky38 SetStage vfreeformlucky38 5 SetObjectiveDisplayed vfreeformlucky38 5 1 Set VFreeformLucky38.bGivenBug to 1 if vfreeformlucky38.bTerminalResort == 1 && vfreeformlucky38.bTerminalSteel == 1 && vfreeformlucky38.bTerminalTools == 1 SetStage vfreeformlucky38 10 endif
I want you not to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我没有动手，你也不要擅自攻击敌人。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Comment (NAM2) : Do not record. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set EDE1REF.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 0 set EDE2REF.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 0 set EDE3REF.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 0
I want you not to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我没有动手，你也不要擅自攻击敌人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你看到敌人就马上攻击他们。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0010C769] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : Do not record. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set EDE1Ref.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 1 set EDE2REF.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 1 set EDE3REF.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 1
I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你看到敌人就马上攻击他们。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0010C769] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : Do not record. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set EDE1Ref.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 1 set EDE2REF.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 1 set EDE3REF.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 1
I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你看到敌人就马上攻击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. I'll have the medical supplies for you by the time you come back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了。等你回来时，我会把药品准备好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emily Ortal [0011904E] (file) Quest : ([0011A0C5]vfreeformlucky38) The Moon Comes Over the Tower EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, take this packet sniffer. It will allow us to intercept data on Mr. House's network.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿着，带上这个数据探测器。它能让我们截取豪斯先生网络上的数据。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emily Ortal [0011904E] (file) Quest : ([0011A0C5]vfreeformlucky38) The Moon Comes Over the Tower EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might have to manually remove the encryption from his data network, but hopefully you won't have too much trouble. Good luck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也许得手动破解数据网络密钥，不过应该不会遇到太多麻烦。祝你好运！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emily Ortal [0011904E] (file) Quest : ([0011A0C5]vfreeformlucky38) The Moon Comes Over the Tower EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: StartQuest vfreeformlucky38 SetStage vfreeformlucky38 5 SetObjectiveDisplayed vfreeformlucky38 5 1 Set VFreeformLucky38.bGivenBug to 1 if vfreeformlucky38.bTerminalResort == 1 && vfreeformlucky38.bTerminalSteel == 1 && vfreeformlucky38.bTerminalTools == 1 SetStage vfreeformlucky38 10 endif
Very well. Will there be anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。还有什么能为您效劳的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: set CashierPayoutQuest.cashier to GetSelf set CashierPayoutQuest.doonce to 1 set CashierPayoutQuest.typevar to 2 startquest CashierPayoutQuest
Here's your NCR money. Will there be anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 给您NCR纸币。还有什么能为您效劳的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: set CashierPayoutQuest.cashier to GetSelf set CashierPayoutQuest.doonce to 1 set CashierPayoutQuest.typevar to 3 startquest CashierPayoutQuest
I'll take my payout in caps.
Caps it is. Will there be anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些是您的筹码。还有什么能为您效劳的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: set CashierPayoutQuest.cashier to GetSelf set CashierPayoutQuest.doonce to 1 set CashierPayoutQuest.typevar to 1 startquest CashierPayoutQuest
I'd like to turn in my chips.
In what currency would you like your payout? Non-caps currencies will have fractions paid out in caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您想兑换成哪种货币？非瓶盖货币会按其等值的瓶盖数量来兑换。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to exchange NCR money for chips.
How many chips would you like?
I'd like to exchange Legion money for chips.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想用军团第纳尔来换筹码。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How many chips would you like?
I'd like to exchange caps for chips.
How many chips would you like?
Why must Mr. House be killed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么一定要杀死豪斯先生？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because he complicates the equation of force. He's a free agent, an unpredictable element.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为他打破了势力间的均衡。他不受任何一方约束，是个不稳定因素。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure he's trying to sit out this battle, just as he did four years ago, hoping the Legion and the Profligates will wipe each other out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢肯定他这次还会像四年前一样作壁上观，盼着军团和荒淫之人两败俱伤。

ESP.ORIGINAL: When he sees the Profligates losing this battle, however, he might throw his support behind them. Except he won't, because he'll be dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，如果这次荒淫之人输掉的话，他可能会派出援军。当然，假如他死了，我们就不必再操心了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like you to go back to the Lucky 38 for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你现在回幸运38赌场去。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Comment (NAM2) : Do not record. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set EDE1REF.Waiting to 0; set EDE2REF.Waiting to 0; set EDE3REF.Waiting to 0; set VNPCFollowers.bEDEHired to 0 set VNPCFollowers.bEDEFired to 1 set VNPCFollowers.bCritterInParty to 0 SetPlayerTeammate 0 RemoveFromFaction FollowerFaction ;SetAV Assistance 0 set VNPCFollowers.nCurrentFollowers to (VNPCFollowers.nCurrentFollowers - 1) if VNPCFollowers.nCurrentFollowers == 0 set VNPCFollowers.bPlayerHasFollower to 0 endif removeperk CompanionSuite player.removeperk EnhancedSensors setAV Aggression 0 ResetAI set vNPCFollowers.bEDEL38 to 1

; (10_1_10) Adding comment to force esp to be rebuilt/added to post-release esms. -ETB
; JSH 11.05.10 - Teleport all the ED-Es to Lucky 38 suite. EDE1REF.MoveToMarkerWithFade L38SuiteCompanionMarker01REF EDE2REF.MoveToMarkerWithFade L38SuiteCompanionMarker01REF EDE3REF.MoveToMarkerWithFade L38SuiteCompanionMarker01REF
showmessage FollowerMessagePerkEDERemove showmessage FollowerMessageLeaveEDE38
I'd like you to go back to the Lucky 38.
Eyebot Duraframe Subject E is both the prototype, and the last functional model in this test group.
ESP.TRADUIT: 眼球机器人“杜拉骨架”实验体E型，是本实验组中最初的原型机，也是最后的可用型号。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was prepared to make several significant upgrades to the machines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我原本要对这些机器进行几项重大的升级。

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, as the project was canceled and all Duraframe assets are being diverted to Hellfire Armor, I am sending this model to the Navarro outpost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，随着计划的取消，用于研发杜拉骨架的资源全都转移到了地狱火装甲上，我打算将这一型号送往纳瓦罗前哨站。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Subject E: Diagnosis complete. Begin Recording.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实验型号E: 诊断完成。开始记录。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My name is Whitley. I'm a researcher at Adams Air Force base. Until recently I was in charge of the Duraframe reinforcement project for the combat model Eyebots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫韦斯利，是亚当斯空军基地的一名研究员。最近一段时间，我都在负责战斗型眼球机器人“杜拉骨架”的强化项目。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please handle this information with the utmost care as it represents the sum total of the results of my research on the Duraframe Eyebots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请谨慎处理这些信息，这可是我对眼球机器人“杜拉骨架”研究的全部成果。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are also several databanks with information on my research into Poseidon Energy and some projects they were working on in the Mojave area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同时还有若干数据库，储存了我对海神能源公司的研究记录，以及他们当时在莫哈维地区所进行的部分项目的基本情报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Navarro outpost scientists, I am glad that ED-E has reached you. You will find several databanks of information on this machine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 纳瓦罗前哨站的科学家们，我很高兴ED-E顺利抵达。你们会在这台机器上找到一些可用的数据。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you are listening to this log from one of our Enclave Outposts in Chicago, give this unit whatever repairs it needs so it can continue to Navarro.
ESP.TRADUIT: 若你收到这段从我们芝加哥英克雷前哨站的发出的录音，请对此单位进行必要的维护，以使其能够继续前往纳瓦罗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Quiet, to himself}This crouching's hell on my knees.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Quiet, to himself}一蹲下来，我的膝盖就像受刑一样难受。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Irritated}Wish I had a Stealth Boy instead of this bear trap.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Irritated}不想要这个捕熊夹，要能有个隐身小子就好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Quiet, stealthy, low growl}Hnnnn. Dog is following.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Quiet, stealthy, low growl}嗯，狗会跟着你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Quiet, stealthy, low growl}No have wrist-collar now - Dog still good at not be seen.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Quiet, stealthy, low growl}即使没有戴手环——狗也能很好的隐藏自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Quiet, stealthy, low growl}How Dog hunted back West. For Lou.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Quiet, stealthy, low growl}以前狗在西部时，就是这样给中尉干活的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like the shadow of a ghost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们就像阴影下的幽灵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We pass like moonlight on still water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们就像洒在寂静水面上的月光。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Salida}Salida del Sol - "Sunrise." {Beat}Not much to look at now.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Salida}日出镇，现在早就看不到日出了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Testing the player, insinuating}You sure came a long way to rob this place. Guess greed is in the blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Testing the player, insinuating}你大老远的跑来，就为了抢这里的宝贝。看来你真是够贪的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (file) Comment (NAM2) : These are idles that Dean says while he's a companion. EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {In any interior}Breath of fresh air in here... literally. {Beat}If you need to take a breather from the Cloud, this is a good spot.
ESP.TRADUIT: {In any interior}这里面…居然还有新鲜空气。{Beat}如果你不想再吸毒云了，倒是可以来这儿换个环境。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sizing place up, liking it}Might be a nice place to hole up for a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Sizing place up, liking it}这地方不错，可以用来暂时藏身。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Salida/Puesta}Check the fountains, might have some wishes... er, chips we can snag.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Salida/Puesta}看看喷泉底下，说不定可以发现一些许愿的……呃，筹码。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Salida/Puesta}Watch the ground for bear traps and {emph}any openings for tripwires.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Salida/Puesta}小心地上的捕熊夹{emph}和门口的绊线。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Salida/Puesta}If I ever had to come here, I stuck to the overhangs and roofs - like sidewalks up there.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Salida/Puesta}要是我一个人来这儿，我一定会选择爬上屋檐和屋顶，在上面穿行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Switching Station}Like a toxic ashtray down here.
{Switching Station}{Thinking}Find a way to get this place hopping again... would clean all the toxic gas out of Puesta del Sol.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Switching Station}{Thinking}如果能想办法让这地方重新启动…就能把日落镇里的毒气全都净化掉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Switching Station}Stinks down here. {To himself}And I can barely smell anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Switching Station}这里散发着恶臭。{To himself}要知道我的嗅觉已经很差了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sarcastic}Sure glad one of us knows what you're doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Sarcastic}还好我们俩中有一个人头脑清醒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (file) Comment (NAM2) : These are idles that Dean says while he's a companion. EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, this used to be a nice town. {Beat}Well, nice enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道么，这镇子本来挺不错的。{Beat}相当不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (file) Comment (NAM2) : These are idles that Dean says while he's a companion. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When in doubt, step quiet - and watch {emph}where you step.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你犹豫了，就放慢脚步，注意脚下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (file) Comment (NAM2) : These are idles that Dean says while he's a companion. EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where there's a bear trap, Ghost People aren't far behind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有捕熊夹的地方，往往附近会有鬼人徘徊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (file) Comment (NAM2) : These are idles that Dean says while he's a companion. EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch out if you see a prize lying around - the Ghost People leave "supplies" as traps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你看到地上有好东西，一定要小心，鬼人喜欢把“物资”放在地上当诱饵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (file) Comment (NAM2) : These are idles that Dean says while he's a companion. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Getting real tired of tourist season - no offense, but you guys are lowering the bar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我非常讨厌旅游旺季，无意冒犯啊，我就是觉得你们拉低了这个地方的档次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (file) Comment (NAM2) : These are idles that Dean says while he's a companion. EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Random comment}Cloud wasn't always here. Grew over the years, even without cars or factories.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Random comment}以前没有毒云的。尽管汽车和工厂早都消失了，可毒云却还是越来越浓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (file) Comment (NAM2) : These are idles that Dean says while he's a companion. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sierra Madre may wait. Not me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算马德雷山脉屹立不倒，我也实在等不下去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (file) Comment (NAM2) : These are idles that Dean says while he's a companion. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slight impatience}Sierra Madre's not getting any younger.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slight impatience}马德雷山脉正在一天天凋敝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (file) Comment (NAM2) : These are idles that Dean says while he's a companion. EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (file) Comment (NAM2) : These are idles that Dean says while he's a companion. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, {emph}this place has seen better days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，{emph}这个地方确实有点残破。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100E413] (ID) NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while with the player. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we need to fight, you should call Dog out... as much as I hate to admit it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管我有些不乐意…但如果我们需要战斗的话，你最好还是把狗叫出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100E413] (ID) NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while with the player. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Thinking}Might be able to use the gas valves around here to set traps of our own.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Thinking}也许可以利用这里的气阀来设计陷阱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100E413] (ID) NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while with the player. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll need to move faster than this if we're going to outwit the Old Man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们想胜过那个老头，那我们的动作得再快一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100E413] (ID) NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while with the player. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Smirks}Happy you followed the Sierra Madre broadcast? Curiosity and greed, same thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Smirks}跟着赌场的广播来这儿，你觉得开心吗？好奇心和贪念，你们都是一样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100E413] (ID) NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while with the player. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's your own fault you're here. Couldn't leave well enough alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你落到这步田地，都是你自己一手造成的。你就是不懂得适可而止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100E413] (ID) NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while with the player. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That Pip-Boy... maybe I'll tear it off your arm, wear it on my neck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个哔哔小子……可能我会把它从你的胳膊上扯下来，戴到我的脖子上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100E413] (ID) NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while with the player. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Air tastes like copper. {Beat, smiles}Or Old World gold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 空气中有一股铜臭味。也许是旧世界的黄金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100E413] (ID) NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while with the player. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Almost got away... then the idiot's hunger screws it up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 眼看就要逃走了…那个白痴却因为饥饿掉链子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100E413] (ID) NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while with the player. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you keep looking at your Pip-Boy? It won't help. {Snorts}Didn't help the Old Man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你一直在看哔哔小子？ 那玩意没用。{Snorts}那个老头已经受过教训了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100E413] (ID) NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while with the player. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't believe the idiot swallowed his collar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不敢相信这个白痴把项圈吞了下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100E413] (ID) NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while with the player. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {1st Time, Clinic}Dog not like this place. Air smells like burnt sparks and blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: {1st Time, Clinic}狗不喜欢这个地方。闻起来有一股燃烧的火苗和血液的味道。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Salida/Puesta Only}When Dog catch a Ghost in plastic, Dog tear him apart so they don't get back up.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Salida/Puesta Only}狗一抓住穿防护服的鬼， 就会把它们撕碎，让它们再也起不来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Salida/Puesta only, Snffs}Smells like... flesh in plastic... lots of food around here. We should catch some.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Salida/Puesta only, Snffs}闻起来像…防护服里的肉…这里有许多食物。我们应该带一些走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Salida/Puesta only}{Worried}Lots of marks on walls from other dead people. They not get far.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Salida/Puesta only}{Worried}墙上有许多其它死掉的人留下的标记。他们没能走多远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Hushed, whispering, looks around}Hope the voice doesn't come back. Mean. Bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Hushed, whispering, looks around}希望那声音不要再回来了。太凶了，太糟了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Rocks on legs}Where is Master? Did he go away? {Apologetic}Dog will be good this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Rocks on legs}主人去哪里了？他走了么？狗下次一定会听话的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slight disgust}Swallowed something bad. Taste like burnt wires.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slight disgust}吞了不好的东西。味道像烧坏的电线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Himself, sad}Always yell at Dog. Yell at Dog because gets hungry, can't stop it... always need more.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Himself, sad}总是骂狗。因为狗总是饿，控制不住…吃得太多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Sad
NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't like this place. Want to go back, back to the Base. {Beat, quiet}Or the Church, miss the Church.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不喜欢这个地方。我想回去，回基地。 {Beat, quiet}或者教堂，我想念教堂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01001301] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is good to travel with another. I spend so long scouting on my own that I forget what human company is like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴与你同行。我一个人执行任务的次数太多了，以至于我都快忘了有一个同伴在身边的感觉了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have seen many strange plants in the valley - plants that seem to hunger for human flesh. Where they come from, I do not know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这个山谷里见过很多奇怪的植物，它们似乎对人类的血肉有着特殊的嗜好。我完全不知道它们是怎么来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: White Leg attacks grow more frequent each day - I fear for our people and for our valley if something is not done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 白腿部落的攻击一天比一天频繁，我担心我的人民和这片山谷将会坚持不下去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Praying to herself}Oh Father, guide and protect us your humble children as we labor in the vineyards, and make us strong to resist those who would steal Zion from us.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Praying to herself}噢先父啊，当我们在葡萄园里劳作时，请引导并保护我们你卑微的孩子们，让我们强大起来，抵御那些想要从我们手中偷走锡安的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish you could have met my family. You would like them, I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你有机会能见到我的家人。你一定会喜欢他们的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Zion used to be a place of peace, you know. Daniel says that it is holy in the eyes of the Father. I hope someday you will see it as it was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 锡安过去是片和平的土地。丹尼尔说，它在先父的眼中就是一片圣土。我希望你能有一天见到它曾经的样子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Praying}Father, I ask that you guide this man who is the vessel of your will. Show him the light of your wisdom and the peace of your love. Amen.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Praying}先父啊，我请求你指引这个承载你意志的人，向他展示你智慧的光芒与平和的爱。阿门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Praying}Father, I ask that you guide this woman who is the vessel of your will. Show her the light of your wisdom and the peace of your love. Amen.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Praying}我的主，我请求你指引这个承载你意志的女人，向她展示你智慧的光芒与平和的爱。阿门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Daniel says that most people outside the valley do not keep to the Father's ways. Perhaps when you leave you will carry His word with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 丹尼尔说，大部分峡谷以外的人都不遵循天父的道路。也许当你离开的时候，会把他的话带在身边？

ESP.ORIGINAL: When Salt-Upon-Wounds took New Canaan, he ordered the White Legs to salt the earth so nothing could grow again. What kind of monster could do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当伤口撒盐占领新迦南时，他命令白腿部落向地面撒盐以阻止任何生命再次生长。什么样的怪物会这么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you are eager to leave Zion, but... perhaps you might find peace if you stayed. Think about it, yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你急切地想离开锡安，但...如果你留下来，也许你能在这里找到安宁。想想看，好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Feels good to be doing some actual scouting, not just following.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进行实际侦查的任务比仅仅跟在后面感觉要好得多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear some odd things about the civilized lands outside Zion. Is there really a giant thunder-lizard people live inside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说了一些关于锡安以外文明国度的怪事。真的生活着巨大的雷霆蜥蜴吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The spitter plants and the green monster men aren't native to Zion. Wonder where they came from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些专吐唾沫的植物和这些绿色怪物不是锡安本地的生物，我一直很奇怪它们从哪儿来？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I finally get to explore all those taboo places without the other scouts yelling at me? Can't wait!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我可以去探索那些禁忌之地而不必担心别的侦察兵会朝我大吼大叫了？哈，我早就等不及了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Talking himself/his home up; wants to impress the player}Bet they don't have anything as nasty as Yao Guai out where you come from, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Talking himself/his home up; wants to impress the player}我打赌在你的家乡没有比妖怪更恶心的东西了，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those, um, what did you call them? {Maybe mispronounce a little}Walkie talkies? Those are going to be loads better than signal drums and smoke signs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些，呃，你管它们叫什么？{Maybe mispronounce a little}对讲机？那些玩意儿看起来，比信号鼓声和烟尘标记要厉害多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That compass thing always knows where north is, huh? Even if it can't see the stars?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个指南针总是知道哪边是北，是吧？即使它认不得星星？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That Back When medicine smells funny. Guess it works though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个“原初时代”的药物闻起来怪怪的，但我猜它应该还有用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There can't really be a place where people go into big buildings and give away all their money just to watch someone flip paper squares on a table...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不可能真的有这样一个地方，人们走进高楼大厦，把所有的钱都捐出去，就为了看有人在桌子上翻动纸方块...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Way I heard it, Salt-Upon-Wounds butchered everyone in New Canaan and nailed their corpses to the cliffs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据我所知，伤口撒盐杀害了新迦南的所有平民，并把他们的尸体钉在了悬崖上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you carry all those bottlecaps, anyway? They jangle like crazy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么背着那么多瓶盖？它们发出摩擦声实在太刺耳了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your chips. Is there anything else I can help you with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些是您的筹码。还有什么能为您效劳的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: set cashierquest1.cashier to GetSelf set cashierquest1.doonce to 1 set cashierquest1.capsvar to 1 startquest cashierquest1
Here's your chips. Is there anything else I can help you with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些是您的筹码。还有什么能为您效劳的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: set cashierquest1.cashier to GetSelf set cashierquest1.doonce to 1 set cashierquest1.legionvar to 1 startquest cashierquest1
Here's your chips. Is there anything else I can help you with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些是您的筹码。还有什么能为您效劳的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: set cashierquest1.cashier to GetSelf set cashierquest1.doonce to 1 set cashierquest1.ncrvar to 1 startquest cashierquest1
I'd like to exchange all my pre-war money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望用所有的战前纸币兑换筹码

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your chips. Is there anything else I can help you with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些是您的筹码。还有什么能为您效劳的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: set cashierquest1.cashier to GetSelf set cashierquest1.doonce to 1 set cashierquest1.cashvar to 1 startquest cashierquest1
I'd like to exchange ALL my money. Caps, Legion, NCR, Pre-war money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望用我所有的钱兑换筹码，瓶盖、军团第纳尔、NCR纸币和战前纸币

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your chips. Is there anything else I can help you with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些是您的筹码。还有什么能为您效劳的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: set cashierquest1.cashier to GetSelf set cashierquest1.doonce to 1 set cashierquest1.capsvar to 1 set cashierquest1.ncrvar to 1 set cashierquest1.cashvar to 1 set cashierquest1.legionvar to 1 startquest cashierquest1
I'd like to exchange all Legion, NCR, and pre-war money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望用所有的军团第纳尔、NCR纸币和战前纸币来兑换筹码

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your chips. Is there anything else I can help you with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些是您的筹码。还有什么能为您效劳的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: set cashierquest1.cashier to GetSelf set cashierquest1.doonce to 1 set cashierquest1.ncrvar to 1 set cashierquest1.cashvar to 1 set cashierquest1.legionvar to 1 startquest cashierquest1
I'd like to exchange ALL my money. Caps, Legion, and NCR money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望用我所有的钱兑换筹码，瓶盖、军团第纳尔和NCR纸币

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your chips. Is there anything else I can help you with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些是您的筹码。还有什么能为您效劳的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: set cashierquest1.cashier to GetSelf set cashierquest1.doonce to 1 set cashierquest1.capsvar to 1 set cashierquest1.ncrvar to 1 set cashierquest1.legionvar to 1 startquest cashierquest1
I'd like to exchange all Legion and NCR money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望用所有的军团第纳尔、NCR纸币来兑换筹码

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your chips. Is there anything else I can help you with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些是您的筹码。还有什么能为您效劳的吗？

Meet with Jessup, leader of the Great Khans in Boulder City.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和躲藏在巨石城里的大汗帮头领杰瑟普会面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help the NCR kill all the Great Khans holed up in the Boulder City ruins.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮助NCR杀死所有藏匿在巨石城遗迹中的大汗帮。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Bribe the NCR troopers into letting the Great Khans escape.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)贿赂NCR部队，让他们放走大汗帮。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Lieutenant Monroe and inform him that you've worked out a deal with the Great Khans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去找门罗中尉，告诉他你已经和大汗帮达成了协议。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Free the NCR troopers being held hostage by the Great Khans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 释放被大汗帮俘虏的NCR军人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell Jessup the Great Khans are free to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉杰瑟普所有大汗帮成员可以安全离开了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Negotiate for the release of the NCR hostages.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与大汗帮就释放NCR人质的事情进行谈判。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help the Great Khans kill all the NCR troops in the Boulder City ruins.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮助大汗帮杀死埋伏在巨石城遗迹周围的NCR部队。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Moon Comes Over the Tower
Disable the Lucky 38's network encryption from three executive consoles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通过三个执行终端瘫痪幸运38的网络安保系统。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bug an access point to the Lucky 38's data network for the Followers of the Apocalypse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为天启追随者植入黑客装置，黑入幸运38的数据网络。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Emily Ortal on the New Vegas strip with news that the tower has been bugged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到新维加斯长街找艾米莉·欧托，告诉她你已经黑进高塔了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Lucky 38 Reactor is being powered by the El Dorado substation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸运38的反应堆是由埃尔·多拉多变电站供电的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; Quest fails if Emily Ortal dies.
Bug an access point to the Lucky 38's data network for the Followers of the Apocalypse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮助天启追随者骇入幸运38的数据网络接入端口。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Emily Ortal on the New Vegas Strip with news that the tower has been bugged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到新维加斯长街找艾米莉·欧托，告诉她你已经骇进了高塔的网络。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Disable the Lucky 38's network encryption from three executive consoles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 骇入三个远程端口，使幸运38的网络加密系统无效化。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The wastelander with the most gear wins! (... or at least survives.) Medium and heavy armor no longer impair movement speed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 装备最多的废土客获胜！(...或者至少能活下来。) 你的负重上限增加50。(与善背perk叠加)

ESP.ORIGINAL: You take a sip from your trusty Vault 13 canteen. Your thirst is subdued and you feel replenished. While carrying your Vault 13 Canteen, you'll drink from it automatically at regular intervals, almost subconsciously. Although it could be easy to take such a thing for granted, you realize how easily it could it be lost and note its importance to your survival in the Mojave Wastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你拿起可靠的13号避难所水壶，喝了口水……
